name: Quarks (Zechospartan)
description:
You are the last fighter pilot of the quark squad. You carry the payload to blow the enemy capital ship to smithereens. The only problem is there's an entire fleet between the capital ship and you.

Control a fighter ship by using the arrow keys, blow enemy ships to gain points with the spacebar. Collect several power-ups that upgrade your ship's weapons. BEWARE OF ASTEROIDS!

I do not own any music or assets used in this game. Any art was sourced from OpenGameArt.org
